title: Amyl and the Sniffers – Guided by Angels (live for The Current)
description:
Ahead of their show at First Avenue in Minneapolis, Australian punk-rock band Amyl and the Sniffers visited The Current studio for a session hosted by Mac Wilson. They played two songs from their latest album, 'Comfort to Me,' including this cut, "Guided By Angels." 

Watch the full studio session: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=b0W1wrgHQH4

Band members
Amy Taylor – vocals
Dec Martens – guitar
Fergus Romer – bass
Bryce Wilson – drums

Credits
Guests – Amyl and the Sniffers
Host – Mac Wilson
Producer – Derrick Stevens
Video Director – Erik Stromstad
Camera Operators – Erik Stromstad, Peter Ecklund
Audio – Eric Xu Romani
Graphics – Natalia Toledo
Digital Producer – Luke Taylor
